mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_TODO VALUES (TODO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{todo_title}, #{todo_content}, #{todo_for}, TO_DATE(#{todo_end}, 'MM-DD'), DEFAULT, #{board_no})
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(B.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CREATE_DATE, B.COUNT, A.*, C.NAME FROM BOARD_TODO A JOIN PJ_BOARD B ON A.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE C ON B.WRITER = C.EMP_NO WHERE B.BOARD_NO = #{board_no}
